main.description: I'm a current undergrad at the University of Manchester graduating 2023 ðŸ¤ž Welcome to my one-pager
main.bio: I'm Rakha Djokosoetono, currently a third year Computer Science student at The University of Manchester. I started coding in 2015. Throughout my journey, I've taught myself various languages and technologies, and put them to use in my various roles and greenfield projects. I'm no superstar programmer, but I try my best everyday.
main.contactmessage: Want to get in touch? Awesome!

education.description: 87% First Year Average, 85% Second Year Average
Vice President of the Indonesian Students Society. Curriculum advisor for the NXT GEN Robotics Society

work.title: Dev & Hackathon Experience Officer
work.description: A student-led initiative focused on cultivating Indonesia's technology talents through the GarudaHacks Hackathon, and more in the works. Created and Launched the GarudaHacks Discord Server for hacker communications. Wrote and Deployed the Hackathon Landing Page

work.title: Developer
work.description: SPE Solution provides financial management technology platform solutions for modern businesses. Created and Maintained a REST API built with MongoDB and Java Spring Boot, as an internal project for human resources allocation

work.title: Programmer
work.description: Training Scheme: Deep Dive into Java 8's features by calling a NEWS API, displayed results locally

work.title: Cloud Specialist
work.description: Cloud migration consulting & transformation company, based in Singapore. Attended client meetings to discuss cloud migration from on-prem tech processes. Conducted market research on cloud competitiveness between AWS, Azure and Google Cloud. Liaised with central Singapore Team.

work.title: Python Programmer
work.description: Training Scheme: Created an entertainment Slack Bot using Python, pushed to the company Slack Workspace. Attended client meetings on technical contingency planning on Software Infrastructure
